titleStmt.title: A declaration of the officers and souldiers under the command of Colonell Twisleton, governor of the castle of Denbigh in Wales.
titleStmt.author: Twisleton, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright, at the Kings-Head in the Old-Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Denbigh this 12. of June, 1648. Signed: George Twisleton. &c.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
